hero.title: Unlock the power of Linux
hero.subtitle: A new life for LinuxJourney, which has helped so many people take their first steps into the world of Linux.

hero.title: Resources
hero.subtitle: Discover curated books, tutorials, and tools to deepen your Linux knowledge.

data.title: Official Ubuntu tutorial
data.description: A step-by-step guide for beginners that explains the history of the terminal and basic commands

data.title: DigitalOcean
data.description: A clear overview of how the terminal works, how to run commands and navigate the filesystem.

data.title: How Linux Works
data.description: One of most highly recommended books!

data.title: UNIX and Linux System Administration Handbook
data.description: Extremely comprehensive book for every SysAdmin.

data.title: Linux Command Bible
data.description: Great comprehensive guide to shell scripting.

data.title: The Linux Programming Interface: A Linux and UNIX System
data.description: For serious Linux-users, great start into kernel programming.
